ygData.subject: RE: Crafted items (some idiot)
ygData.msgSnippet: Market is too flooded to sell to a PC really.  You need an Avaik charm and 2 star rubies.  I would rather grab my 100pp than lugging around a pair of lore
ygData.messageBody:
Market is too flooded to sell to a PC really. You need an Avaik charm and 2
star rubies. I would rather grab my 100pp than lugging around a pair of
lore gauntlets on the off chance I could sell them to a PC. Normally I grab
as many star rubies as I can afford before I go Avocet hunting. I either A)
use them to make gauntlets. B) Sell them to other people who need them to
make gauntlets. Even if I don't sell them all, I only loose about 6pp when
I sell them back to a vendor. With this I can EASILY make 200pp in a short
night's work.

> -----Original Message-----
> From: Trevalien [SMTP:trevalien@...]
> Sent: Monday, August 30, 1999 12:21 PM
> To: EQCheats@onelist.com
> Subject: RE: [EQCheats] Crafted items (some idiot)
>
> From: "Trevalien" <trevalien@...>
>
> I would think you could make ALOT more if you sold them to a PC.
>
> What do u turn in for the Crafted Gauntlets? Also Who do u give them to?
>
> Trevalien
>
>
> >From: Joel Thronburg <jthronburg@...>
> >Reply-To: EQCheats@onelist.com
> >To: "'EQCheats@onelist.com'" <EQCheats@onelist.com>
> >Subject: RE: [EQCheats] Crafted items (some idiot)
> >Date: Mon, 30 Aug 1999 12:14:51 -0500
> >
> >From: Joel Thronburg <jthronburg@...>
> >
> >Crafted Gauntlets sell for 238pp to a vendor. This is with amiable
> faction
> >and a 110 charisma. Sold many a pair to vendors as it only costs 136pp
> for
> >the two star rubies. Enjoy!
> >
> > > -----Original Message-----
> > > From: Trevalien [SMTP:trevalien@...]
> > > Sent: Monday, August 30, 1999 12:14 PM
> > > To: EQCheats@onelist.com
> > > Subject: RE: [EQCheats] Crafted items (some idiot)
> > >
> > > From: "Trevalien" <trevalien@...>
> > >
> > > Just out of curiosity, can someone see what a pair of crafted
> gauntlets
> > > sells for to a merchant? (just be careful u dont actualy sell them!) I
>
> >was
> > >
> > > in Felwithe (on povar) the other day and found that someone had sold a
> > > pair
> > > to a merchant (the merchant wanted about 3200pp) I know how merchants
> >work
> > >
> > > and I figure that he might have goten 50-100pp. There was also some
> >other
> > > items that i was amazed that anyone would sell but i forget what they
> >were
> > >
> > > (i think a BIBS was in there)
> > >
> > > Trevalien
> > >
> > > >From: "Whitcraft,David" <DWHITCRAFT@...>
> > > >Reply-To: EQCheats@onelist.com
> > > >To: "'EQCheats@onelist.com'" <EQCheats@onelist.com>
> > > >Subject: RE: [EQCheats] Crafted bracer
> > > >Date: Mon, 30 Aug 1999 11:52:10 -0500
> > > >
> > > >From: "Whitcraft,David" <DWHITCRAFT@...>
> > > >
> > > >I got to do this quest over the weekend. It take a sapphire (normal
> gem
> > > >store sapphire, about 100pp), and a "bunch of optic nerves" from an
> >evil
> > > >eye. A 'bunch' (I think it's called a bunch, it's optic nerves
> anyways)
> > > is
> > > >ONE item. goodluck!
> > > >
> > > >-----Original Message-----
> > > >From: Jonathan [mailto:jp1234@...]
> > > >Sent: Sunday, August 29, 1999 2:25 AM
> > > >To: EQCheats@onelist.com
> > > >Subject: [EQCheats] Crafted bracer
> > > >
> > > >
> > > >The optic nerves for the quest require 'a bunch of optic nerves'
> right?
> > > >They werent no drop so I'm not sure..
